content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'tfmfiles_rmlaccountdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [tfmfiles_rmlaccountdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://rmlaccountdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/tfmfiles', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE accounts (
	[originatingleadid] varchar(8000),
	[revenue] numeric(38,18),
	[industrycode] int,
	[numberofemployees] int,
	[accountid] varchar(8000),
	[transactioncurrencyid] varchar(8000),
	[ownerid] varchar(8000),
	[modifiedon] datetime2(7),
	[territoryid] varchar(8000),
	[createdon] datetime2(7),
	[name] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'accounts/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [tfmfiles_rmlaccountdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM accounts
GO
